main event: Witness observed a bright object in the sky near Woodland Hills, California on December 21, 1952, which appeared at high velocity and vanished suddenly.
interesting points: The object was similar in appearance to a jet aircraft but moved at an incredible speed, estimated at 2,200 mph,The sighting lasted about 15-20 seconds,The object was said to be reflecting sunlight and appeared bright and round,No sound was reported from the object,The report indicates there were multiple observations around the same time.
witness description: Witness was driving and stopped to observe the object.
